alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Nelson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 12:17PM EST until January 12 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Rolling Fork River near Boston affecting Hardin and Nelson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rolling Fork River near Boston. * WHEN...From this morning to early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, Agricultural bottomland is covered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM EST Monday the stage was 35.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 36.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 35.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 37.3 feet on 02/22/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index. php?wfo=lmk Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued tomorrow.
